channel.title: Jon Remucal on The Huddle
channel.description: Recent content in Jon Remucal on The Huddle

item.title: Handling: Doing The Little Things
item.description: There’s a lot more to being a great handler than meets the eye. Being one of the better throwers on your team is important. But there have been plenty of teams on which the best thrower is not a handler, especially when it comes to hucking. This isn’t say that being a great thrower doesn’t help a handler be great. Rather, there are a lot of factors and skills that make some handlers particularly effective.
